feed.title: OMRON Industrial Automation
feed.tagline: OMRON Industrial Automation functions as a partner to help innovate worldwide manufacturing. Through our experience in sensing and control technology, we enable manufacturers to operate with greater productivity and streamlined efficiency.

entry.title: Switch Mode Power Supply (15/30/50/100/150/300/600-W Models)
entry.summary: Superior Basic Performance That Ensures Reliability. Wide Range of Standards Certification and Greater Usability.(S8FS-G)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.summary: The new series for VT-S730, Full-3D Inspection Systems(VT-S730-H)

entry.summary: Connect I/O Relay Terminals to I/O Units for Programmable Controllers with one touch.(XW2Z-R)

entry.title: GX-series IO-Link Master Unit
entry.summary: IO-Link makes sensor level information visible and solves the three major issues at manufacturing sites! The unit for M12 Smartclick connector can be used in watery, and dusty environments.(GX-ILM08C)

entry.summary: Build a temperature control system with heater burnout detection in conjunction with a temperature input unit and PID instructions(NX-HB)

entry.summary: Build a cost saving weighing/ measurement system by using load cells(NX-RS[][][][])

entry.summary: Smart Fiber Amplifier Units with White LEDs. High Color Discrimination Capability with the Same Easy Operation as Previous Fiber Amplifier Units. Existing General-purpose Fiber Units Can Be Connected.(E3NX-CA)

entry.title: Temperature Monitoring Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Ideal to prevent heater overheating. Self-latching output to contribute to safe equipment operation.(K8DT-TH)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Three-phase Voltage, Asymmetry, and Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Detect overvoltages, undervoltages, voltage asymmetry, phase sequence, and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PZ)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Three-phase Voltage and Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Protect motors and other equipment by detecting overvoltages, undervoltages, phase sequence, and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PM)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Protect motors and other equipment by detecting phase sequence and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PH)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Conductive Level Controller
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Ideal for water level control. Sensitivity adjustment and timer for easy usage.(K8DT-LS)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Single-phase Overvoltage/Undervoltage Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect abnormal voltages applies to equipment to protect against equipment failure. Monitor for overvoltages and undervoltages simultaneously with one Relay.(K8DT-VW)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Single-phase Voltage Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect abnormal voltages applies to equipment to protect against equipment failure. Use in either overvoltage or undervoltage mode.(K8DT-VS)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Single-phase Overcurrent/Undercurrent Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect errors in motors and other equipment through current changes. Monitor for overcurrents and undercurrents simultaneously with one Relay.(K8DT-AW)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Single-phase Current Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect errors in motors and other equipment through current changes. Use in either overcurrent or undercurrent mode.(K8DT-AS)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: S8VK-S (60/120/240/480-W Models)
entry.summary: A Perfect Fit for Small Control Panels Coated PCBs for Better Resistance to Environment Connections for Easy Wiring(S8VK-S)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: SCARA Robots
entry.summary: Small SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling(Cobra 350)

entry.summary: Provides simplicity and flexibility in connecting serial devices to EtherCAT(NX-CIF)

entry.summary: Four-axis parallel robot achieves high speed and high precision(Quattro 800H)

entry.title: Parallel Robots
entry.summary: Four-axis parallel robot achieves high speed and high precision(Quattro 650H / HS)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Solid State Relays for Heaters
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Single-phase SSR for low heat generation enables carrying 25 A (G3PJ-[]25B(-PU)) even for close mounting of three SSRs to contribute to downsizing of control panels. Models available with push-in input terminals.(G3PJ)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: I/O Relay Terminal
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. I/O Relay Terminals with 16 Points and Push-In Plus terminal blocks to Downsize Control Panels and Save Labor.(G70V)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Slim I/O Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Global standard size, low profile slim I/O relay with width 6.2 mm.(G2RV-SR)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Slim I/O Solid State Relay
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Global standard size, low profile type slim I/O solid state relay with width 6.2 mm.(G3RV-SR)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Push-In Plus Terminal Block Sockets
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Sockets with Push-In Plus Terminal Blocks to Save Work Added to Series for MY and G2R-S Relays.(PYF-[][]-PU / P2RF-[][]-PU)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Power OFF-delay Timer
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Set two time ranges with each Timer, from 0.1 to 12 seconds for the S Series and from 1.0 to 120 seconds for the L Series.(H3DT-H)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Star-delta Timer
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Set two time ranges between 1 and 120 s with one Timer.(H3DT-G)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Twin Timer
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Switch between flicker-OFF or flicker-ON start mode.(H3DT-F)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Power ON-delay Timer
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Single Mode Timers with power ON delay operation.(H3DT-A)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Multi-range, Multi-mode Timer
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Multiple time ranges and operating modes let you cover a wide range of applications.(H3DT-N / -L)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: DIN Track Terminal Blocks with Screw Terminals
entry.summary: Global-standard DIN Terminal Blocks for Control Panels(XW5T-S)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: DIN Track Push-in Terminal Blocks
entry.summary: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Push-in Plus Terminal Blocks to Downsize Control Panels and Save Work.(XW5T-P)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.summary: Reliable measurements for any material and surface types(ZW-7000)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Parallel Robots
entry.summary: Parallel robot ideal for use in the food and beverage, pharmaceutical, and healthcare industries(Hornet 565)

entry.title: Fiber Unit Build-in Lens Series, Flat Model
entry.summary: Optical Axis Adjustment in 20 Sec and Ultra-high-power Beam Greatly Reduce Installation and Maintenance Work(E32-LT35Z)
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: NJ-series NJ Robotics CPU Units
entry.summary: New controller that covers functions and high-speed processing required for machine control and safety, reliability and maintainability that are the features of industrial controllers provides parallel link robot control function. In addition to robot control, general motion control with up to 64 axes can be also performed.(NJ501-4[][][])
entry.dc:subject: New product

entry.title: Sysmac Library
entry.summary: The Sysmac Library for the NJ/NX/NY Controller provides Function Blocks packed with know-how that makes advanced control easy.(SYSMAC-XR[][][])
